queryData.drillDownQuery: from ApiErrorAnalysisAgg {{querystring}} within {{from}}L, {{to}}L per "{{per}}s" select {{selectPhase}} group by {{groupByPhase}} {{orderBy}} limit {{limit}};
queryData.listApisQuery: from AM_API select API_NAME group by API_NAME
queryData.listVersionsQuery: from AM_API on (API_NAME == '{{selectedAPI}}' ) select API_ID, API_VERSION group by API_ID, API_VERSION
queryData.listOperationsQuery: from AM_API_URL_MAPPING on (API_ID == {{selectedVersion}} ) select URL_PATTERN,HTTP_METHOD group by URL_PATTERN,HTTP_METHOD
queryData.listAppsQuery: from AM_APPLICATION select NAME,CREATED_BY group by NAME,CREATED_BY
